title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for chatting with Ollama models, embeddings, and pull/push.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers, published to npm.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models for chat, tools, embeddings, and retrieval.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model management, multi-user, dark mode).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with async, streaming, and embedding support.

title: ollama-rails
summary: Ruby gem wrapping Ollama’s REST API for Rails apps.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models inline as GitHub-Copilot alternative.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper with chat history, syntax highlighting, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Minimal cross-platform desktop GUI for Ollama built with Tauri & React.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models for generative QA and embeddings pipelines.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official Docker Compose stacks including GPU & CPU variants.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix package and module for declarative Ollama deployments.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Ready-to-run RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + Streamlit.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that chats via Ollama with slash commands and moderation.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Lightweight Slack bot server using Bolt JS and Ollama for on-prem LLM chats.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with async streaming and dependency-injection helpers.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to run Ollama containers in CI pipelines for testing LLM features.

title: ollama-models
summary: Community-curated Modelfile collection (CodeLlama, Llava, Mistral fine-tunes).
